mapper.select: SELECT replyno, writeno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate FROM s_reply ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT replyno, writeno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate FROM s_reply WHERE writeno = #{writeno} ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT m.id, m.name, r.replyno, r.writeno, r.memberno, r.content, r.passwd, r.rdate FROM members m, s_reply r WHERE (m.memberno = r.memberno) AND r.writeno = #{writeno} ORDER BY r.replyno DESC
